src:
Surxondaryo viloyatining Bandixon tumani qayta tashkil etiladi. Qiziriq va Boysun tumanlari chegaralari o‘zgartirilishi mumkin

07 Nov 2019, 16:11

Surxondaryo viloyatining Bandixon tumanini qaytadan tiklanadi. Bu haqda jamoatchilik muhokamasiga qo‘yilgan Vazirlar Mahkamasining tegishli qarori loyihasida aytiladi.


Foto: Surxondaryo viloyati hokimligi matbuot xizmati

Hujjatga ko‘ra, Surxondaryo viloyatining Bandixon tumani qayta tiklanib, Qiziriq va Boysun tumanlari chegaralari o‘zgartirilishi mumkin.
Surxondaryo viloyati Qiziriq tumani hududidagi “Bandixon”, “Bektepa”, “Obod turmush”, “Polvontosh”, “Saroy”, “Birdamlik”, “Chinor”, “Paxtakor”, “Navbahor”, “Farovon”, “Bahoriston”, “O‘rg‘ilsoy”, “Gulbog‘”, “Qaldirg‘och”, “Zevar”, “Xo‘jaipok”, “Obod yurt” hamda “Bag‘ri keng” mahalla fuqarolar yig‘inlarini (umumiy yer maydoni 20531 gektar) hamda Boysun tumanining “Sayrob” va “G‘ayrat” massivlaridan (umumiy yer maydoni 17360 gektar) qayta tiklanayotgan Bandixon tumani tarkibiga o‘tkaziladi.
Surxondaryo viloyatining Qiziriq va Boysun tumanlari hududidan Bandixon tumani hududiga o‘tkazilayotgan yer maydoni chegaralarining tavsifi va chizma shakllari tasdiqlanadi.
Qaror loyihasi muhokamasi 21-noyabrgacha davom etadi.

Mavzuga doir: 
Toshkent hududi kengaytiriladi: Zangiotadagi O‘zgarish qishlog‘i Sergeli tumani tarkibiga o‘tkazildi

Ma’lumot uchun, hukumatning 2010-yil 24-dekabrdagi qarori bilan Surxondaryo viloyatining Bandixon tumani tugatilib, uning hududi Qiziriq tumaniga birlashtirilgan.
text:
Bandikhan district of Surkhandarya region will be reorganized. The borders of the Red and Baysun districts may be changed

07 Nov 2019, 16:11

Reconstruction of Bandikhan district of Surkhandarya region. This is stated in the draft resolution of the Cabinet of Ministers for public discussion.


Photo: Press Service of Surkhandarya Regional Hokimiyat

According to the document, Bandikhan district of Surkhandarya region will be restored and borders of Kyzylkik and Boysun districts will be changed.
"Bandikhon", "Bektepa", "Prosperous Life", "Polvontosh", "Saroy", "Birdamlik", "Chinor", "Pahtakor", "Navbahor", "Farovon", "Bahoriston", Civic gatherings of citizens "Orgilsoy", "Gulbog", "Swallow", "Zevar", "Khojaipok", "Obod yurt" and "Bagri Keng" (total area 20531) hectares) and the Baysun district of Bandihan district, which is being reconstructed from the Sayrob and Gairat estates (total area 17360 hectares).
The description and drawing patterns of the boundaries of the land transferred from the territory of Kizirik and Baysun districts of Surkhandarya region to Bandikhan district.
Discussion of the draft decision will continue until November 21.

Topic:
Expanding Tashkent: Changing Village in Zangiota was transferred to Sergeli District

According to the government's decision of December 24, 2010, Bandihan district of Surkhandarya region was liquidated and its territory was united into Qiziriq district.
